trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand> event is raised when a button within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>이벤트는에 있는 단추는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>컨트롤을 클릭 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCommand>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 이 옵션을 사용 하면이 이벤트가 발생할 때마다 사용자 지정 루틴을 수행 하는 이벤트 처리 메서드를 제공할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control also raises other specialized events when certain buttons are clicked (buttons with the `CommandName` property set to "Delete", "Update", and "Page" for example).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>제어 하면 다른 특수 특정 단추를 클릭 하는 경우 (서로 다른 단추는 `CommandName` 속성이 예를 들어 "삭제", "업데이트" 및 "페이지"로 설정).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When using one of these buttons, you should consider handling one of the specialized events provided by the control (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>).
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤에서 제공 하는 특수 이벤트 중 하나를 처리를 고려해 야 이러한 단추 중 하나를 사용할 경우 (예: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleted>

trans-unit.source: A GridViewCommandEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked.
trans-unit.target: GridViewCommandEventArgs 개체 명령 이름과 클릭 된 단추의 명령 인수를 확인할 수 있는 이벤트 처리 메서드에 전달 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: To determine the command name and command argument, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 명령 이름 및 명령 인수를 확인 하려면 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>속성을 각각.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also access the button control that raised the event by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 이벤트를 발생 하는 단추 컨트롤에 액세스할 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [NIB: 이벤트 사용](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)합니다.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of GridViewCommandEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 목록이 GridViewCommandEventArgs의 인스턴스에 대 한 초기 속성 값에 대 한 참조는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>생성자.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified source of the command and event arguments.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs"> </xref> 클래스 명령 및 이벤트 인수에 지정된 된 소스를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs> 의 새 인스턴스를 초기화 하려면이 생성자를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>안내 하십시오.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs> 인스턴스에 대 한 초기 속성 값을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The object contained in the `commandSource` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 초기 값 | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>| 에 포함 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>개체 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>속성의 값은 `originalArgs` 매개 변수입니다. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>| 에 포함 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>개체 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>속성의 값은 `originalArgs` 매개 변수입니다. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>| 에 포함 된 개체는 `commandSource` 매개 변수입니다. | > [!NOTE] > 이벤트를 발생 시킬 때이 생성자는 주로 컨트롤 개발자가 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: 소스 명령입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> 이벤트 데이터를 포함 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified row, source of the command, and event arguments.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs"> </xref> 클래스 지정된 된 행의 명령 및 이벤트 인수는 소스를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs> 의 새 인스턴스를 초기화 하려면이 생성자를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>안내 하십시오.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs> 인스턴스에 대 한 초기 속성 값을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The object contained in the `commandSource` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 초기 값 | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>| 에 포함 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>개체 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>속성의 값은 `originalArgs` 매개 변수입니다. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>| 에 포함 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>개체 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>속성의 값은 `originalArgs` 매개 변수입니다. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>| 에 포함 된 개체는 `commandSource` 매개 변수입니다. | > [!NOTE] > 이벤트를 발생 시킬 때이 생성자는 주로 컨트롤 개발자가 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object that represents the row containing the button.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> 단추를 포함 하는 행을 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: 소스 명령입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> 이벤트 데이터를 포함 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: 명령의 원본을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandSource property to access the properties of the object that represents the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: CommandSource 속성을 사용 하 여 명령이 소스를 나타내는 개체의 속성에 액세스할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: In the case of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs> object, the source of the command is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that contains the button clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: 경우에 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>명령 원본이 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>사용자가 단추를 포함 하는 컨트롤을 클릭 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A instance of the <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> class that represents the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스는 <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> 명령의 소스를 나타내는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control has handled the event.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 이벤트를 처리 했는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` in the event handler to specify that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control should not handle the event because you are handling it in your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 `true` 되도록 지정 하려면 이벤트 처리기에는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>제어 되므로 사용자 코드에서 처리 하는 이벤트를 처리 하지 않도록 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data-bound event code was skipped or has finished; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>데이터 바인딩 이벤트 코드 건너뛰었거나; 완료 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.
